title: Complete Your Twin Setup
subtitle: Finish setting up your AI Twin to unlock all features and earn rewards

tasks.title: Set up Twin's unique name
tasks.description: Choose a unique identifier for your AI Twin. This name will be used across the platform and help others discover your Twin.

tasks.title: Upload your SD avatar
tasks.description: Upload a standard definition profile picture for your Twin. This will be the visual representation of your Twin in the platform.

tasks.title: Upload HD video
tasks.description: Upload a high-definition video to train your Twin's visual model. This helps create a more realistic and personalized Twin experience.

tasks.title: Upload audio sample
tasks.description: Provide audio samples to clone your voice. Your Twin will use this to communicate in your unique voice and speaking style.
